allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$text = Get-Content ''E:\Workspace.Dev.Go\ArticleSpinner\test_spintax.txt'' -Raw; $open = ([regex]::Matches($text, ''\{'')).Count; $close = ([regex]::Matches($text, ''\}'')).Count; Write-Host ''Open braces:'' $open; Write-Host ''Close braces:'' $close; Write-Host ''Difference:'' ($open - $close)")
